item.title: Geopolitical Reflections on the Western Hemisphere and Global Power Shifts
item.description: In this essay, Juan Manuel Grijalvo explores how geopolitics, once an academic discipline and strategic game for elites, has entered popular discourse. He begins by tracing the origins of geopolitical...
